scripts.dev: npm run dev -w services/relay & npm run dev -w services/mock-fleet & npm run dev -w services/emulator-manager & npm run dev -w apps/demo-console
scripts.build: npm run build -w services/relay && npm run build -w services/mock-fleet && npm run build -w services/emulator-manager && npm run build -w apps/demo-console
scripts.start: npm run start -w services/relay & npm run start -w services/mock-fleet & npm run start -w services/emulator-manager & npm run preview -w apps/demo-console
